ca_cert.description: The path to the Jenkins self-signed certificate.

server_url.description: The URL of the Jenkins server to connect to.

domain.description: The domain namespace that the credentials will be added to.

folder.description: The folder namespace that the credentials will be added to.

name.description: The identifier assigned to the credentials.

scope.description: The Jenkins scope assigned to the credentials.

secret.description: The credentials secret text string. If left empty will be unmanaged.

secret_id.description: The roles secret_id. If left empty will be unmanaged.

name.description: The unique name of the JenkinsCI folder.
